author: ETA PRIME
description:
n this video, we’re taking a first look at the world’s first glasses-free 3D handheld gaming PC — the Abxylute 3D One. This massive 10.95-inch handheld features an Intel Core Ultra 7 258V Lunar Lake CPU, Intel Arc A140V GPU, 32 GB LPDDR5X RAM, and a 120 Hz 2.5K display capable of real 3D depth without glasses — thanks to AI eye-tracking cameras built right into the frame.
We’ll check out build quality, 3D display performance, benchmark results, and real gaming tests in Cyberpunk 2077, Forza Horizon 5, and GTA V Enhanced.
The detachable controllers, optional keyboard, and kickstand make it a true 3-in-1 hybrid — handheld, tablet, or mini-laptop. 

https://abxylute.com/products/abxylute-3d-one
